titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the Temple-chappel, at the funeral of the Right Reverend Father in God, Dr. Brounrig late Lord Bishop of Exceter, who died Decem. 7. and was solemnly buried Decemb. 17. in that chappel. With an account of his life and death· / Both dedicated to those honorable societies, by the author Dr. Gauden.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the Temple-chappel, at the funeral of the Right Reverend Father in God, Dr. Brounrig late Lord Bishop of Exceter, who died Decem. 7. and was solemnly buried Decemb. 17. in that chappel. With an account of his life and death· / Both dedicated to those honorable societies, by the author Dr. Gauden.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Best for Andrew Crook, at the Green-Dragon in S. Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: "The memorials of the life and death of the R. Rd. Father in God Dr. Brounrig .." has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
With three final leaves of verse.
Variant: with "those honorable societie" in title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
